alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Morgan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 23 at 3:06AM MST until December 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills ongoing, as low as 45 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected, as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...The far northeast plains of Colorado, including northeast Weld, Morgan, Washington, Logan, Phillips and Sedgwick Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 11 AM MST this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 8 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: The combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands. The combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Logan County; Morgan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County; Washington County
